name: Hole Digger (SMH Studios)
description:
This game was made for the BRACKEYS #3 game jam.

Theme: Holes.

You are a small miner who has to run away  from a barrier by getting into holes or digging them yourself.

I hope you enjoy!

Please don't  forget to rate my game for the jam and leave a comment.:D

Thanks for playing.

In the future, there will be more updates.
